channel.title: Need server to send message every 2 minutes
channel.description: How do i make it so the server sends a message to everyone like every 2 minutes. I need it to say something like "we do not give away items or mod and admin" and i need one to say the forums link..how do i do it? someone please help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2008, 03:10:26 pm[/size][hr]ok so someone help me? cmon i help people all the time[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2008, 03:34:41 pm[/size][hr]omg someone help me. this is stupid..no one ever helps on these forums

item.source: Need server to send message every 2 minutes

item.title: Need server to send message every 2 minutes
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Ya that works, but instead of switching twice, just do this:

[code]public class MessageTimer extends Thread implements Runnable {

public void run() {
    int timeStopped = System.currentTimeMillis(); //get current ms
    while (true) { //infinite loop
        if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - timeStopped) >= 120000) { //check if 120000 ms have passed (2 minute)
            if (firstMsg) {
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Message number 1"; //send message to all players online
            } else {
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Message number 2";
            }
            firstMsg = !firstMsg;
            timeStopped = System.currentTimeMillis();
        }
        try { //try clause
            Thread.sleep(50); //sleep thread
        } catch(InterruptedException ie){} //catch a java.lang.InterruptedException
    }
}
boolean firstMsg = true;

}[/code]

[quote=“mr luigi 77, post:11, topic:242471”]Can someone Rep++ me?
Lol…
Please…
Thanks!
:D[/quote]

No asking for Rep.

Read full topic
